line_1: 'Tis something strange, no hold, it isn't because
line_2: The men have had the power of making Laws;

line_1: Unless it be some few who hide them, 'cause
line_2: They would not seem to violate those laws

line_1: When I've at hand my genuine one, because!
line_2: But why for these dull Reasons do I pause,
Ingrateful Devils grudge them due Applause.

line_1: He damns the Church for Schismaticks because
line_2: They alter'd their Allegiance by the Laws;

line_1: For if so be, as how, because —
line_2: He's one o'th' guardians of her laws;
